bignmf.models.nmf module¶

class bignmf.models.nmf.NmfBase(k)[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Base abstract NMF class. All Joint NMF and Single NMF classes inherit from this class.

Classifies the input array based on max filter along the specified axis

  • axis (int) – Axis along which to perform the classification

Classified array in one-hot format

classmethod connectivity_matrix(x: <built-in function array>, axis)[source]¶

Calculates the connecitivity matrix along the given axis.

The function first classifies the input matrix along the specified axis and then matrix multiplies it to itself keeping the rank side common.

Parameters:
  • x (np.array) – the input matrix.
  • {int} (axis) – axis along which the connectivity matrix should be classified. For W matrix, it’s 1
  • for the H matrix it is 0. (and) –
Returns:

the output matrix.
Return type:

np.array

wrapper_update(iter, verbose=0)[source]¶

Updates the weights for the number of iterations specified.

Parameters:
  • iter (int) – Number of iterations through which the model should update.
  • verbose (int, optional) – Defaults to 0. To increase verbsosity.
